rules.ruleString: Unit was previously coded {BTF5903, BTM5903, BTX9030}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {BTF5903, BTG9270, BTX5140, BTX5950, BTX9020, BTX9030, MBA9002}

description: This unit examines business law in a management context. It will cover contractual and non-contractual risks and will provide instruction on how to identify, assess and manage these different legal risks. It will also provide an introduction to different legal forms of business organisations and their comparative risks and advantages.
